title: Life Drain
summaries: The Life Drain is a Hardmode magic weapon that deals constant damage to all enemies near the cursor's position, as long as the distance between the player and the cursor is unobstructed. A stream of red particles flows toward the user from each targeted enemy. While the weapon is in use, the user receives the Life Drain buff, which adds 1.5 health per second to existing health regeneration, plus 0.5 health per second for every two extra enemies hit, while also increasing the ramp-up speed of natural regeneration greatly. While an enemy is being damaged by the Life Drain, it is also inflicted with a special debuff that deals 5 damage per tick. The Life Drain has a 1/5 (20%) chance to be dropped by Crimson Mimics.

statistics.Sell: 8 GC
